name: Darker Font - Jim Can Read It!
description:
A simple darkening fonts on a page when needed. Downside is that it may hide light colored lettering on a dark background.

I only use this if I really just can't read a real light font and zooming in doesn't help.

Works on all URLs

user.name: Jim Dodd
user.about:
My eyesight has recently degraded, and I can no longer read some web pages. Grey text on slightly lighter or slightly darker background (aka low contrast) is a real problem for me. So are the recent use of skinny typefaces.

It has been my mission to learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript so I can create more legible themes for websites I use a lot.

Suggestions and hints/tips are always welcome.

additional_info: Keywords: High Contrast, Readability, Light Theme, Lite Theme, Dark Font, Better Contrast, Darker Font - Jim Can Read It!
